channel.title: 508 and 317 help need!
channel.description:
508: I AM GETTING ERRORS WHEN TRYING TO RUN A 508 SERVER AND CLIENT. THE CLIENT SAYING "CAN NOT FIND MAIN CLASS:LOADER" AND WHEN I CHECK IN SERVER FILE, IT'S THERE. IN THE BUILD.BAT THIS IS WHAT IT SAYS
@echo off loader.CLASS pause
AND RUN.BAT
@echo off loader.JAVA pause
[left]317:[left]I ALREADY RUN A AWESOME 317 SERVER AND I WAS WONDERING HOW DO I CHANGE MAX LEVEL FROM 138 TO 126 AND REMOVE SUMMONING FROM CHANGING MAX LEVEL TO 138? HOW DO I ADD DONATOR AND CHANGE OWNER CROWN? ANYONE KIND TO HELP THANKS! HOW DO I FIND OUT WHERE TO DIG FOR CLUE SCROLL?[/left][/left]

item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

508:
I AM GETTING ERRORS WHEN TRYING TO RUN A 508 SERVER AND CLIENT. THE CLIENT SAYING “CAN NOT FIND MAIN CLASS:LOADER” AND WHEN I CHECK IN SERVER FILE, IT’S THERE. IN THE BUILD.BAT THIS IS WHAT IT SAYS

@echo off
loader.CLASS
pause
AND RUN.BAT
@echo off
loader.JAVA
pause

[left]317:[left]I ALREADY RUN A AWESOME 317 SERVER AND I WAS WONDERING HOW DO I CHANGE MAX LEVEL FROM 138 TO 126 AND REMOVE SUMMONING FROM CHANGING MAX LEVEL TO 138? HOW DO I ADD DONATOR AND CHANGE OWNER CROWN? ANYONE KIND TO HELP THANKS! HOW DO I FIND OUT WHERE TO DIG FOR CLUE SCROLL?[/left][/left]
